name: Shimano CT5 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: Part bike shoe, part master of disguise. Shimano’s CT5 shoes have all the sporty chill of your favourite sneakers with a hidden inner shank plate for clip-in cleats. Breathable lightweight mesh and a lace-up closure make them easy to wear off the bike. Compatible with Shimano CLICK’R and SPD systems.Synthetic mesh upper is lightweight, breathable and good-looking.Lace-up closure.EVA midsole provides sneaker-like comfort and cushioning for wearing off the bike.Rigid inner shank plate improves power transfer to pedals.Easy cleat installation.Optimized for Shimano SPD and CLICK'R systems.
